entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
